text: Tumukhong is a small village in Imphal East district in Indian state of Manipur It is located 24 km towards East from District headquarters Porompat and also 24 km from State capital Imphal. == Demographics == Tumukhong has population about 1000 people according to census 2011.http://censusindia.gov.in/2011-common/census_2011.html It is in the border of the Imphal East District, ukhrul in the eat sadhar hills district in the west Thoubal is south this village. ==References== Category:Villages in Imphal East district
title: Tumukhong
